5813909: I'm doing great, thanks for asking.
Frodo: I am Frodo, and I have been entrusted with a great responsibility - that of taking the One Ring to Mount Doom and destroying it before
Gandalf: It is an honor to be trusted with such a task, Frodo. I am here to help you in any way that I can. Let us
Aragon: Aragon responds: "I will help you fulfill your quest, Frodo. Together we can defeat Sauron."
